## Checklist

### For All PRs

- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the existing style and formatting
- [ ] I have tested any examples or templates
- [ ] All links are valid and working

### For New Skills

- [ ] SKILL.md has valid YAML frontmatter
- [ ] README.md exists with installation instructions
- [ ] LICENSE file included
- [ ] marketplace.json updated
- [ ] Root README.md updated with new skill

### For Skill Updates

- [ ] Version bumped in SKILL.md
- [ ] last-updated date changed
- [ ] Changelog entry added
